errors.error_description: Unnecessary system dependencies are listed that are not actually required for pajbot installation
correction_candidates: Remove libssl-dev libffi-dev python3-dev as they are not needed
Replace with only libssl-dev as the single required dependency
Change to postgresql-dev libxml2-dev dependencies instead
Keep only python3-dev and remove the other two dependencies
errors.golden_answer: Remove libssl-dev libffi-dev python3-dev as they are not needed
